nodes.text: Dark Forces: The Collector's Trilogy audio drama

Dark Forces: The Collector's Trilogy audio drama, was a dramatization written by John Whitman, adapted from the material written by William C. Dietz in the Dark Forces novellas. The dramatization was released as an audiobook CDs and tapes as well as broadcast on NPR. The performance was directed by Peter Moore and featured a score by veteran Star Wars composer John Williams.
